styles.name: Photorealistic
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a hyper-photorealistic style with extreme detail, natural lighting, lifelike textures, and authentic visual clarity that mimics high-end photography

styles.name: ModernBrutalist
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a modern brutalist art style with raw concrete textures, bold geometric forms, stark minimalism, monolithic structures, and a powerful industrial aesthetic

styles.name: Geometric3D
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a geometric 3D art style with polygonal shapes, low-poly aesthetics, sharp angular forms, and vibrant faceted surfaces with depth and dimension

styles.name: Surrealism
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a surrealist art style with dreamlike imagery, unexpected juxtapositions, melting forms, impossible perspectives, and fantastical elements inspired by Dal√≠ and Magritte

styles.name: Whimsical3D
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a whimsical 3D style with playful cartoon-like characters, soft rounded forms, pastel colors, cute proportions, and a magical fairy-tale aesthetic

styles.name: NeonArt
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a vibrant neon art style with glowing neon lights, electric colors, dark backgrounds, luminous outlines, and a retro-futuristic nightlife atmosphere

styles.name: Cyberpunk
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a cyberpunk style with neon-lit cityscapes, high-tech low-life aesthetics, holographic elements, rain-slicked streets, and a dystopian futuristic atmosphere

styles.name: Cinematic
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a cinematic style with dramatic lighting, film color grading, widescreen composition, bokeh effects, and the visual quality of a Hollywood movie still

styles.name: Anime
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a Japanese anime style with large expressive eyes, vibrant hair colors, clean line art, cel-shading, and dynamic poses typical of manga and anime

styles.name: FlatDesign
styles.prompt_text: Transform this image into a flat design style with minimal shadows, bold solid colors, simple geometric shapes, clean lines, and a modern minimalist vector illustration aesthetic
